mymetal.io.post package

Submodules

mymetal.io.post.construct module

construct submodule

This submodule provides functions for generating content for post-processing tasks related to materials simulations designed for mymetal.post subpackage.

Functions:

  • create_content: Creates the content required for post-processing tasks.

mymetal.io.post.construct.create_content(list=[], tag_split='   ', tag_end='', tag_begin='', left=True, num=10)

have a list of char, using myjust() to formatted them.

output a char to write in a specified file

mymetal.io.post.write module

write submodule

This submodule provides functions for writing content to files for post-processing tasks related to materials simulations designed for mymetal.post subpackage.

Functions:

  • write_content_to_file: Writes content to a file.

mymetal.io.post.write.write_content_to_file(content_char, path, write_type='a')

write content_char to file controled by write_type.

for example, a-append, w-write overlap

Module contents

post module

This module provides functions for post-processing tasks related to materials simulations. It includes utilities for generating and writing content to files for analysis and visualization after performing calculations.

Submodules:

construct: Creates the content required for post-processing tasks. write: Writes the generated content to a specified file.
